title: Title
titleHtmlHelp: Defines the title of the page in search results or on the page's tab. It should be under 60 characters.
descriptionHtmlHelp: A short and accurate summary of the content of the page used in search results. It should be between 50-160 characters.
robotsHtmlHelp: Search engine indexing setting. To let Google fully index and crawl your page, leave these UNCHECKED. Learn more about these options
robotsNoFollow: Do not crawl links on page (nofollow)
gtmIdHelp: Container ID provided in Google Tag Manager (e.g., GTM-RPCVDTN).
gaIdHelp: Tracking ID provided by Google Analytics.
googleVerifyIdHelp: Verification ID provided by Google for the HTML meta tag verification option.
canonicalHelp: Is there a main version of this page that search engines should direct to?
